sen.j: 鹿ヶ谷通（ししがたにどおり）は京都市内の南北の通り。
sen.e: Shishigatani-dori Street is one of the south and north street in Kyoto City.
Shishigatani-dori Street is a street running north-south in Kyoto City.
Shishigatani-dori Street is a street running north-south in Kyoto City.

sen.j: 北は銀閣寺近くの今出川通から、南は南禅寺山内まで、東山 (京都府)北部の山麓を通る。
sen.e: It runs from Imadegawa-dori Street which is near Ginkakuji at north to Nanzen-ji Temple Yamauchi at south, and it goes through the mountain at northern part of Higashiyama (Kyoto Prefecture).

It runs from Imadegawa-dori Street which is near Ginkakuji to the north, to Nanzen-ji Temple Yamauchi in the south, and goes through the mountain in the northern part of Higashiyama (Kyoto Prefecture).

It runs from Imadegawa-dori Street which is near Ginkaku-ji Temple to the north, to Nanzen-ji Temple Yamauchi in the south, and goes through the mountain in the northern part of Higashiyama (Kyoto Prefecture).

sen.j: 銀閣寺門前は観光地、南禅寺の近くは広大な庭園を備えた屋敷が続くが、途中は山裾の住宅地である。
sen.e: In front of Ginkakuji is the tourist spot, and the residences with big garden are lined around Nanzen-ji Temple, but on the way, there is a residential area at the base of a mountain.
In front of Ginkakuji is a tourist spot, and mansions with big gardens line Nanzen-ji Temple, but on the way, there is a mountain-foot residential area.
sen.cmt: Robert: It would be easier to write a more natural sentence if we knew what mountain they were talking about.
sen.e: In front of Ginkaku-ji Temple is a tourist spot, and mansions with big gardens line Nanzen-ji Temple, but on the way, there is a mountain-foot residential area.

sen.j: 西側の白川通と同じく南禅寺や禅林寺 (京都市)付近では、観光シーズンに参拝客のタクシーや観光バスで混みあい、しばしば渋滞が発生する。
sen.e: The traffic jam will caused by many taxis and tourist buses for worshipers around Nanzen-ji Temple and Zenrin-ji Temple (Kyoto City) which is similar to Shirakawa-dori Street at east side.

There are substantial traffic jams here caused by the many taxis and tourist buses for worshipers around Nanzen-ji Temple and Zenrin-ji Temple (Kyoto City) which is similar to Shirakawa-dori Street to the east.

There are substantial traffic jams here caused by the many taxis and tourist buses for worshipers around Nanzen-ji Temple and Zenrin-ji Temple (Kyoto City) which is similar to Shirakawa-dori Street to the east.

tit.cmt: 頭文字を大文字にし、ピリオドを削除

sen.j: 銀閣寺 今出川通東入
橋本関雪記念館 今出川通西入
sen.e: Hashimoto Kansetsu Museum and Garden (Imadegawa-dori Street nishi iru)

Hashimoto Kansetsu Museum and Garden (Imadegawa-dori Street nishi-iru)

sen.j: 泉屋博古館 丸太町上ル
